summary: Small Imperial Company Outside Castle Dour
descriptionHtml:
A Small imperial Company Outside Castle Dour. Mainly Made For Myself.

The Company Contains two Heavy Lancerii, One Tribune, Quartermaster And Several Archers And Soldiers, Total Of Ten Soldiers.
Soldiers Use Both Bow And Sword Aswell As Shields. Melee Lancerii Use Sword, Shield And Heavy-Armor. Tribune Is A Lot Heavier Version Of The Soldier. Quartermaster Use Bow And Sword, And Archers Stay Behind And Shoot Arrows.

Use AFT, EFF Or UFO For Better A Experience.

And Convenient Horses For Horse Combat And Mounted Followers.

Obviously Recommended for A Imperial Aligned Character.
author: Settlerking
